region: 波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那
introduction: The story is following Ivan, a young boy who wants through a hooligan lifestyle to show his brother and others that he's grown up, but his actions create a cyclic problem that sucks in both him and his brother. He learns about the dark side of the world of grown-ups and the price that must be paid by him is paid by his older brother Aleksa at the end.源自：https://tickets.sff.ba/films/1932
